entries.name: Backpack
entries.properties: Can hold 50 lbs and is worn on the back.
entries.description: A leather backpack with one large opening.

entries.name: Bedroll
entries.properties:
+3 to a quality of sleep check.
+2 to a cold resist check.
entries.description: A wool blanket wrapped and tied with leather straps.

entries.name: Quality bedroll
entries.properties:
+10 to a quality of sleep check.
+8 to a cold resist check.
entries.description: A hide sleeping bag and stuffed fur pillow wrapped and tied in a leather bag.

entries.name: Blanket
entries.properties:
+2 to a quality of sleep check.
+2 to a cold resist check.
entries.description: A wool blanket.

entries.name: Quality blanket
entries.properties:
+5 to a quality of sleep check.
+6 to a cold resist check.
entries.description: A fur blanket wrapped and tied with leather straps.

entries.name: Bit and bridle
entries.properties: +3 to any checks about riding an animal when used.
entries.description: Leather straps and an iron bit that wraps around an animal's head.

entries.name: Block and tackle
entries.properties:
Can hoist 4x typical strength.
Must be able to hook onto rope or chain connected to the ceiling.
entries.description: A pair of pulleys with hooks and an included hempen rope.

entries.name: Chain
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] Can burst with 25 STR check if bound and 20 STR check with a melee weapon.
entries.description: A 10 ft iron chain.

entries.name: Chalk
entries.hidden properties: [ARCANA 12] Can draw magic circles as part of a ritual using chalk.
entries.properties: Can write on most rough surfaces.
entries.description: A white stick of chalk.

entries.name: Collar and leash
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 13] Can burst with 18 STR check if bound.
entries.properties: +5 to any checks about handling an animal when used.
entries.description: Leather strap with a belt buckle attached to a 5 ft long leather leash.

entries.name: Chain collar and leash
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 13] Can burst with 25 STR check if bound.
entries.properties: +7 to any checks about handling an animal when used.
entries.description: Iron chain wrapped through a ring and attached to a 5 ft long chain leash.

entries.name: Component pouch
entries.properties: For holding all needed ingredients for alchemy or spells.
entries.description: A leather belt pouch.

entries.name: Caltrops (25)
entries.properties: For 5 action points, spread 25 caltrops in a 5 ft area. Any creature entering the area must make a 15 DEX ST or suffer 1 piercing DMG and be slowed for 1 minute.
entries.description: Small iron tacks that form a tetrahedron allowing one tip to always be pointing upward.

entries.name: Canvas (paper)
entries.properties: Used for creating scrolls or maps.
entries.description: Thick paper sheets.

entries.name: Climbing gear
entries.hidden properties: [BALANCE 16] Can attempt more difficult climbing techniques, such as lead climbing, or repelling, and climbinb above the anchor.
entries.properties: With a proper top anchor, a person with climbing gear can climb to the anchor safely with a belayer and long enough rope (2x as long as climb).
entries.description: Iron clipping hooks and a leather harness.

entries.name: Cooking pot
entries.properties: Used for heating food.
entries.description: An iron pot with a handle and lid.

entries.name: Crowbar
entries.properties:
Adds +7 to STR when prying an object open.
For melee, treat as a club.
entries.description: Iron rod bent at one end.

entries.name: Handbell
entries.properties: Sounds an alert to all within 100 ft. This is not deemed an instrument.
entries.description: A signaling bell made of brass with a leather handle.

entries.name: Fishing tackle
entries.properties: Make a survival check near a body of water to potentially catch fish.
entries.description: A wooden fishing pole, silk line, bobbers, hooks, sinkers, lures, and a small net.

entries.name: Flask
entries.properties: Can hold 1/2 liter (pint) of liquid.
entries.description: A brass flask with a metal cap for holding strong drink.

entries.name: Flint and steel
entries.properties: Can create sparks to start a fire or light a torch.
entries.description: A dark quartz that sparks when struck with the steel tool.

entries.name: Grappling hook
entries.properties: Can throw to a ledge with 30 ft of rope.  DEX check to determine success.
entries.description: Iron claws attached to a 30 ft rope.

entries.name: Hookshot
entries.properties: Can fire a hook up to 100 ft that can penetrate soft wall or hook onto an edge. Holding the trigger quickly draws in the line and can carry up to 200 lbs.
entries.description: Steel claws attached to a 100 ft durable line that fires from a pistol.

entries.name: Hammer
entries.properties: For melee, treat as a club.
entries.description: Iron hammer head with a wooden handle.

entries.name: Hand mirror
entries.properties: Can see reflection on surface.
entries.description: Steel handled silver mirror.

entries.name: Hunting trap
entries.properties: +3 to survival checks for small or medium game.  Creature caught can perform 18 STR check to release, then slowed for 1 minute.
entries.description: Iron grips mechanically sprung tightly together.

entries.name: Large hunting trap
entries.properties: +3 to survival checks for medium or large game.  Creature caught takes 4 piercing DMG and can perform 25 STR check to release, then slowed for 1 hour.
entries.description: Iron grips with teeth mechanically sprung tightly together.

entries.name: Lantern
entries.properties: Wick can be lit and produce 40 ft radius of light for 1 hour.
entries.description: Iron container housing a flask of oil and wick that shines light through small glass windows.

entries.name: Bullseye lantern
entries.properties: Wick can be lit and produce 80 ft cone of light for 1 hour.
entries.description: Iron container housing a flask of oil and wick that shines light through a glass lens.

entries.name: Crystal lantern
entries.properties: Produces 30 ft radius of light that cannot be extinguished unless crystal is broken.
entries.description: Iron container housing a luminescent crystal that shines light through small glass windows.

entries.name: Lock
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] A lockpick and Sleight of hand check of 12 is needed to pick the lock.
entries.properties: Can lock a chest or other hinged container.
entries.description: Iron lock with a pair of matching keys.

entries.name: Quality lock
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] A lockpick and Sleight of hand check of 16 is needed to pick the lock.
entries.properties: Can lock a chest or other hinged container.
entries.description: Brass lock with a pair of matching keys.

entries.name: Master lock
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] A lockpick and Sleight of hand check of 22 is needed to pick the lock.
entries.properties: Can lock a chest or other hinged container.
entries.description: Steel sophisticated lock with a pair of matching keys.

entries.name: Magnifying glass
entries.properties: +1 Inspection when used.
entries.description: A silver handled glass lens.

entries.name: Mess kit
entries.description: An iron spoon, fork, and bowl wrapped tightly together.

entries.name: Oil flask
entries.properties: Refills a flask of oil.
entries.description: A clay container containing a flask's worth of oil.

entries.name: Perfume
entries.properties:
+2 Persuasion towards opposite sex or a noble when used.
Has 5 uses.
entries.description: A silver vial of delicate perfume.

entries.name: Pickaxe
entries.properties:
Can be used to mine out a rock wall.
For melee, treat as a pickaxe.
entries.description: An iron double headed pick on a wooden handle.

entries.name: Pen and ink
entries.properties: Can write up to 5 scrolls or maps, or 10 documents with the amount of ink given.
entries.description: A feather quill and glass container of black ink.

entries.name: Pouch
entries.properties: Can carry 5 lbs worth of small objects (such as 20 bullets, 15 darts, or coins).
entries.description: A soft leather pouch with a drawstring that can be strapped across the waist.

entries.name: Quiver for bolts
entries.properties: Can hold 20 crossbow bolts.
entries.description: A hard leather pouch for holding crossbow bolts.

entries.name: Superior quiver for bolts
entries.properties: Can hold 40 special crossbow bolts, and a player no longer needs to keep track of standard crossbow bolts.
entries.description: A high quality hard leather pouch with intricate designs for holding crossbow bolts.

entries.name: Quiver for arrows
entries.properties: Can hold 20 arrows.
entries.description: A hard leather pouch for holding arrows.

entries.name: Superior quiver for arrows
entries.properties: Can hold 40 special arrows, and a player no longer needs to keep track of standard arrows.
entries.description: A high quality hard leather pouch with intricate designs for holding arrows.

entries.name: Rope
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] Can be burst with a slashing weapon or a 20 STR check.
entries.properties: 50 ft long.
entries.description: A hemp wound rope.

entries.name: Fine rope
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] Can be burst with a slashing weapon or a 22 STR check.
entries.properties: 60 ft long.
entries.description: A silk wound rope.

entries.name: Sack (5)
entries.properties: Can hold 15 lbs worth of small objects.
entries.description: 5 hemp cloth sacks.

entries.name: Saddle
entries.properties:
Required for riding a typical pack animal long distances.
+2 to any checks about riding an animal when used.
entries.description: A leather saddle able to strap to an animal across the belly.

entries.name: War saddle
entries.properties:
Required for riding a typical pack animal long distances.
+3 to any checks about riding an animal when used.
entries.description: A hard leather saddle able to strap to an animal.

entries.name: Exotic saddle
entries.properties:
Required for riding an animal, other than a typical pack animal, long distances.
+3 to any checks about riding an animal when used.
entries.description: A customized hard leather saddle able to strap to an animal.

entries.name: Saddlebags
entries.properties: Can hold 25 lbs on either side.
entries.description: Large hide bags held together by rope and bound to an animal with leather straps.

entries.name: Scale
entries.properties: Can compare the weight of two objects each under 5 lbs.
entries.description: A wooden scale balanced by two open discs tied to the scale by string.

entries.name: Scroll case
entries.properties: Can hold 10 scrolls or maps.
entries.description: A hard leather case with a removable lid.

entries.name: Sealing wax and stamp
entries.properties: Can seal an envelope with some authentication.
entries.description: A custom wooden headed stamp with a stick of wax.

entries.name: Shackles
entries.hidden properties:
[INSPECTION 15] Chain can burst with 25 STR check if bound and 20 STR check with a melee weapon.
A lockpick and Sleight of hand check of 14 is needed to pick each hand's lock.
entries.description: Iron bands chained together that can be tightly locked to hands or feet.

entries.name: Shovel
entries.properties:
Can be used to dig a hole in soft ground.
For melee, treat as a club.
entries.description: Iron spade head on a wooden pole.

entries.name: Soap
entries.properties: +1 Persuasion after use when talking to nobles.
entries.description: A bar of fat, wood ash, and soda.

entries.name: Spyglass
entries.properties: +3 Perception on area more than 120 ft away.
entries.description: A collapsable tube with a lens at either end.

entries.name: Tent
entries.properties:
Can hold two people.
+3 to a quality of sleep check.
+2 to a cold resist check.
entries.description: A portable cloth tent with stakes, rods, and rope lining.

entries.name: Tinderbox
entries.properties: Can create sparks to start a fire or light a torch.
entries.description: A tin box containing a dark quartz that sparks when struck with the steel tool and tinder.

entries.name: Torch (5)
entries.properties:
Can be lit and produce 40 ft radius of light for 30 minutes.
For melee, treat as a club that deals an extra 1 fire DMG.
entries.description: An oil soaked cloth wrapped around a large stick.

entries.name: War horn
entries.properties: Sounds an alert to all within 300 ft. This is not deemed an instrument.
entries.description: A signaling horn made from ivory.

entries.name: Waterskin
entries.properties: Can hold 1 liter of liquid.
entries.description: A hide container with a cork stopper and a leather sling.

entries.name: Whistle
entries.properties: Sounds an alert to all within 200 ft. This is not deemed an instrument.
entries.description: A signaling horn made of brass.

entries.name: Whetstone
entries.properties: Can sharpen a blade.
entries.description: A smooth hard rock.
